title: Lives of the Laureates The Elusive Quest for Growth: Economists
Adventures and Misadventures in the Tropics

Eighteen winners of the Nobel Prize in Economics offer autobiographical essays about their lives A former World Bank economist examines the many and work. attempts to help the world’s poorest nations and why these attempts have so often failed
